name: PromptCraft 2025
description: An AI prompt engineering challenge where participants design creative and effective prompts to solve tasks using AI tools.

name: Typing Contest
description: A speed and accuracy typing competition with multiple rounds, including time trials, error-free typing, and endurance challenges.

name: The 5-Hour Forge (Hackathon)
description: A fast-paced, 5-hour hackathon where participants build real, usable software from scratch based on a surprise theme. Focus: impact, usability, and innovation. Winners earn prizes.

name: CAD-a-thon
description: A 3D design and CAD modeling contest where participants replicate complex models using software like AutoCAD or SolidWorks, testing precision and creativity.

name: Structure Battles - Bridge Building
description: An engineering challenge where teams design and build bridges using given materials. Structures are tested for strength, stability, and load capacity.

name: Guess The Programming Language?
description: A fun quiz-style contest where participants identify programming languages based on given code snippets.

name: WHO AM I?
description: A quiz contest where participants guess engineering materials/components based on clues, properties, and real samples.

name: Line Follower Robo
description: A robotics competition where teams build autonomous robots that follow a track using sensors with speed and accuracy.

name: Web Design
description: A website development competition to create responsive, creative, and user-friendly websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Drone (Workshop)
description: A hands-on drone building workshop where participants learn the basics of drone components, assembly, and control.

name: Robo war
description: A robot combat competition where participants design and battle robots in weight categories, testing durability and strategy.

name: CodeMania
description: A competitive programming contest where participants solve algorithmic and logical coding problems within a time limit.

name: Photopedia
description: A photography competition focusing on technical precision and creativity, capturing innovation and campus spirit.

name: DroneSim Challenge
description: A virtual drone flying competition where participants pilot drones in simulation software, focusing on control, accuracy, and speed.

name: Object Avoidance Challenge
description: A robotics challenge where autonomous bots must navigate through an obstacle course without collisions, using sensors and logic.

name: Code & Circuit Clash
description: A hardware-software fusion competition where participants integrate coding with circuit design to solve real-world problems.
